text: Rustum Ghazaleh () also transl. from Arabic as Rostom Ghazale, Rustom Ghazalah, Rustom Ghazali; 3 May 1953 â€“ 24 April 2015) was a Syrian military and intelligence officer. On 24 July 2012, Ghazaleh was appointed chief of political security. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Syrian generals
title: Rustum Ghazaleh
